Hello: {{ name }}!

Hello!

age: {{age}}

hair color: {{hairColor}}

import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-example', templateUrl: './example.component.html', styleUrls: ['./example.component.scss'] }) export class ExampleComponent implements OnInit { // USE INPUT WHEN PASSING IN PROPS @Input() name: string = ""; @Input() age: string = ""; @Input() hairColor: string = ""; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
